title: KPMG International Cooperative
description: KPMG International Cooperative, widely recognized in the accounting and professional services industry, uses a distinctive palette of blue shades in its branding. These colors, including Pantone shades '2F59A7', '0051BA', '034EA2', '4178D9', and '00205B', symbolize trust, expertise, and reliability, attributes that are core to KPMG's global recognition. These brand colors are visibly incorporated into the firm's logo, marketing materials, and digital platforms, as seen on their official website.
